thread.title: Zoe Ball swaps ex-hubby DJ Norman Cook for BBC Antiques Roadshow cameraman
thread.title_full: Zoe Ball swaps ex-hubby DJ Norman Cook for BBC Antiques Roadshow cameraman

author: ekirby
title: Zoe Ball swaps ex-hubby DJ Norman Cook for BBC Antiques Roadshow cameraman
text:
fatboy to toyboy Zoe Ball swaps ex-hubby DJ Norman Cook for BBC Antiques Roadshow cameraman 
The Strictly: It Takes Two host has enjoyed a string of dates with Billy Yates just five months after splitting from Norm By CARRI-ANN TAYLOR Comments SMITTEN Zoe Ball has swapped her Fatboy Slim hubby for a toyboy TV cameraman. 
The Strictly: It Takes Two host, 46, has enjoyed a string of dates with Billy Yates just five months after splitting from DJ Norman Cook. Splash News Zoe Ball has swapped her Fatboy Slim hubby for a TV cameraman who works on Antiques Roadshow 
She and Antiques Roadshow worker Billy have been seen kissing and she recently helped him move home. 
Zoe’s telly star dad Johnny Ball, 78, said last night: “We are very happy that she is finding a new lease of life. 
“She is very happy at the moment, and that is lovely.” 
Mum-of-two Zoe wore her trademark black as she helped Billy, 40, carry lamps and artwork in to his new flat in South London. 
She then returned alone to her South Coast home for the weekend. 5 Zoe has enjoyed a string of dates with Billy Yates, above, just five months after splitting from DJ Norman Cook 
The blossoming romance comes after she split with Norman, 53, in September following 17 years of marriage, as revealed by The Sun on Sunday. 
The couple have two children, 16-year-old Woody and six-year-old Nelly, and still live in the same street. 
A source said: “It has been a tough time for Zoe but she’s smiling again and is very happy. 
“She is in a great place and very happy with Billy. 
“They get on really well and are very close.” News Group Newspapers Ltd Zoe’s blossoming romance comes after she split with Norman following 17 years of marriage Related Stories BOYS NIGHT OUT Jamie O'Hara and Calum Best jet to Scotland for lads night out a day after Celebrity Big Brother final 'BORN TO ENTERTAIN' Man claims £150,000 in benefits while claiming the only job he could do is being a celebrity unreal estate The real price of Britain's most famous TV properties, from Downton Abbey to Del Boy's flat 'I was putting my life at risk' Stavros Flatley star Demi Demetriou reveals stint on Sugar Free Farm led to doctor's dire warning over his famous tattooed belly Holy carey, Batman! Mariah Carey dazzles in sequin jacket as she leads star arrivals of The Lego Batman Movie 'I WANT TO DATE AN A-LISTER' Honey G opens up about looking for love and wanting to settle down with a top musician Two weeks ago Zoe and Billy were seen kissing in the back of a cab in London.
An onlooker said: “They looked like a new couple who are besotted with each other. 
“Zoe couldn’t stop smiling and was very into him, they look great together.” Getty Images 5 Mum-of-two Zoe wore her trademark black as she helped Billy, 40, carry lamps and artwork in to his new flat in South London 
It is believed the pair met several months ago when they were introduced through mutual friends at the BBC . 
As well as Antiques Roadshow, Billy has worked on a string of other shows including ITV’s The Xtra Factor . 
Reports said he runs Billy Yates Media, which has just £123 in funds. Zoe’s ex Norman was once worth an estimated £18million. 
On his Twitter page Billy describes himself as an “award-winning pickled egg scoffer, booze quaffin’, part-time lady sniffing, solver of life’s everyday problems.”
